alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:13PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fresno County through 645 PM PDT... At 613 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles southwest of Fresno, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fresno, Raisin City, Bowles, Calwa, Easton and Fowler. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
